api_list.api_description: Shortens a given URL using the is.gd service.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL you want to shorten.

optional_parameters.name: shorturl
optional_parameters.description: Custom shortened URL you would like to use (5 to 30 characters).

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Used only with format 'json' to specify a callback function.

optional_parameters.name: logstats
optional_parameters.description: If 1, enables logging of detailed statistics.

query: I would like to create a short URL for 'https://www.reddit.com' and enable logging of detailed statistics. How can this be achieved?
